form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION FOR STATUS AS PERMANENT RESIDENT, O.M.B. No. 43-R040

full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/1/2023 UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE GPO: 1973-521-939 Immigration and Naturalization Service APPLICATION FOR STATUS AS PERMANENT RESIDENT Form Approved O.M.B. No. 43-R0400 FEE STAMP File No. APPLICATION FOR THE BENEFITS OF SECTION: Sec. 203(a)(7) and Sec. 245, I&N Act Sec. 245 Sec. 214(d), I&N Act Sec. 249 I&N Act Sec. 13, Act of 9/11/57 24051441m (DO NOT WRITE ABOVE THIS LINE.) (SEE INSTRUCTIONS BEFORE FILLING IN APPLICATION. IF YOU NEED MORE SPACE TO ANSWER FULLY ANY QUESTION ON THIS FORM, USE A SEPARATE SHEET AND IDENTIFY EACH ANSWER WITH THE NUMBER OF THE CORRESPONDING QUESTION. FILL IN WITH TYPEWRITER OR PRINT IN BLOCK LETTERS IN INK.) 3-151 Issued 1. I hereby apply for the status of a lawful permanent resident alien on the following basis: (Check box A, B, C, D, E, or F) I151-8043692 A. bleshmed 805167 As a refugee to whom an immigrant visa isammediately available (Section 203(a)(7) and Section 245, I&N Act) B. As a person who entered the U.S. with a visa issued to |me as the flancee or fiance of a U.S. citizen whom I married within 90 days after my entry, or as a child of such fiancee or fiance (Sec. 214(d)/I&N Act). C. As a former government official, or as a member of the immediate family of such official (Section 13, Act of September 11, 1957). D. As a person to whom an immigrant visa is immediately available, other than one described above (Section 245, I&N Act). E. As a person who has resided in the United States continuously since prior to July 1, 1924 (Section 249, I&N Act). F. As a person who has resided in the United States continuously since a date on or after July 1, 1924, but before June 30, 1948 (Section 249, I&N Act). 2. My name is (Last in capital letters) (First Name) (Middle Name) 3. Sex TRIVEDI PADMAPRABHA I Male Female 4 I reside in the United States at: (c/o) (No. and Street) (Apt. No.) (City) (State) (ZIP Code) 5. Have you ever applied before for permanent resident Hudson River state Hosp., Poughkee psie, N.Y. 12601 status in the U.S.? Yes No 6. My alien registration number 7. I am a citizen of (Country) 8. Date of Birth (If "Yes", give the date and place of filing and A21769890 is INDIA 11/2/1907 final disposition.) 9. Place of Birth (City or Town) (County, Province, or State) (Country) Nov SURAT / GUJARAT, INDIA 10. Name as appears on nonimmigrant document (Form I-94) TRIVEDI PADMAPRABHA I last arrived in the United States at the port of (City and State) on (Month) (Day) (Year) by (Name of vessel or other means of travel) NEWYORK, NY 1/6/74 AI 115 as a (visitor, student, crewman, parolee, etc.) my I-94 permit number is VISITOR B-2 I was was not inspected. 11. My nonimmigrant visa, number was issued by the on (Month) (Day) (Year) 12. I am single married United States Consul at (City)( (Country) Boultan 12/19/73 divorced widowed 13. I have been married ONE times, including my present marriage, if now married. (If you are now married give the following:) a. Number of times my husband or wife has been married b. Name of husband or wife (Wife give maiden name) ONE PREMKRISHNA c. My husband or wife resides with me apart from me at Address (Apt. No.)(No. & Street)(Town or City)(Province or State) (Country) 14. a. I have 3 sons or daughters as follows: (Complete all columns as to each son or daughter; if living with you state "with me" in last column; otherwise give city and state or country of son's or daughter's residence). Name Sex Place of Birth Date of Birth Now living at MRIGENDRATRIVEDI in INDIA 8/21/25 Poughkeepsie, N.Y. 12601 YOGENDRA TRIVEDI in INDIA 1/6/29 Bombay India Married CHAUTAMIDKSHIT F INDIA 3/30/27 Bombay India Married 15 b. The following members of my family are also applying for permanent resident status: PREMKRISHNA 15. I list below all organizations, societies, clubs, and associations, past or present, in which I have held membership in the United States or a foreign country, and the periods and places of such membership. (If you have never been a member of any organization, state "None".) NONE UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE RECEIVED TRANS. IN RET'D-TRANS.
